item.title: Gulmarg
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Gulmarg, adorned with snow-capped peaks, lush meadows, and dense forests, exudes unparalleled natural beauty. Its tranquil lakes, vibrant flowers, and panoramic vistas captivate visitors, making it a haven for nature lovers and adventure seekers alike
item.content:encoded: Gulmarg, adorned with snow-capped peaks, lush meadows, and dense forests, exudes unparalleled natural beauty. Its tranquil lakes, vibrant flowers, and panoramic vistas captivate visitors, making it a haven for nature lovers and adventure seekers alike

item.title: Sonamarg
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Nestled in the Himalayas, Sonamarg enchants with its snow-capped peaks, alpine meadows, and meandering rivers. Known as the “Meadow of Gold,” its lush landscapes, including the Thajiwas Glacier and verdant valleys, offer a serene retreat for trekkers and nature enthusiasts amidst Kashmir’s breathtaking scenery.
item.content:encoded: Nestled in the Himalayas, Sonamarg enchants with its snow-capped peaks, alpine meadows, and meandering rivers. Known as the “Meadow of Gold,” its lush landscapes, including the Thajiwas Glacier and verdant valleys, offer a serene retreat for trekkers and nature enthusiasts amidst Kashmir’s breathtaking scenery.
